answerText: Novaya Zemlya District [or New Land; accept Nova Zembla and Gaselandet][10] Novaya Zemlya is on the Northeast Passage along the northern coastline of this largest country in the world. If you need more, Kazan, Astrakhan, Yaroslavl, and Nizhny Novgorod are cities on its Volga River.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 4 | 17 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The Matochkin Strait separates Severny and Yuzhny in this archipelago that was populated with Nenets settlers to keep the Norwegians out. For 10 points each: [10] Name this archipelago administered as part of the Arkhangelsk Oblast that was the site of the Tsar Bomba tests. It lies between the Barents and Kara Seas.
